techmeme.title: TikTok users shouldn't count on Trump to save the app, as his stance has been inconsistent and the app's existence brings little upside for him post-election (Dave Lee/Bloomberg)
David Sacks, Trump's AI and crypto czar, lacks deep ties to either industry but is a longtime critic of tech regulation, which investors view as more important (Bloomberg)
Palantir and Anduril announce a partnership to advance AI capabilities for US national security, focusing on data readiness and processing data at scale (Connor Hart/Wall Street Journal)
The CFPB issues an order establishing supervisory authority over Google Payment; Google says it's challenging the decision in court (Rami Ayyub/Reuters)
The EU sends TikTok an urgent request for information on Russia's role in Romanian election turmoil, a day after ordering it to retain all election-related data (Kelvin Chan/Associated Press)
